UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile in the system.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Auth.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

role.description: The user's role in the system.

status.description: The approval status of the user's account.

profile_status.description: The completion status of the user's profile.

isVolunteer.description: Indicates if the user has signed up as a volunteer.

volunteerStatus.description: The approval status of the user's volunteer application.

level.description: User's gamification level based on total points. Bronze: 0+, Silver: 1000+, Gold: 5000+, Platinum: 10000+.

points.description: User's engagement points for rewards. (100 BDT = 1 Point)

badges.description: List of badges earned by the user.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user was created.

lastLogin.description: The timestamp of the user's last login.

profileUpdatedAt.description: The timestamp when the user last updated their profile information.

skills.description: List of skills for volunteers or collaborators.

referralCode.description: Unique code for referring new users.

referredBy.description: The UID of the user who referred this user.

lastGiftClaimedAt.description: Timestamp of when the user last claimed a gift by resetting their points.

pointsExpireAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user's points will expire (e.g., 1 year after earning).

shortDescription.description: A brief, one-sentence summary of the campaign for list views.

description.description: The full, detailed description of the campaign for its dedicated page. Supports markdown.

goal.description: The target amount to be raised.

raised.description: The total amount raised so far.

voteOptions.description: List of categories or items that users can vote on for this campaign.

qrCodeUrl.description: URL of the campaign's QR code image.

shortLink.description: A shortened link for sharing the campaign.

telegramLink.description: Link to a Telegram channel/group for campaign proof.

createdBy.description: UID of the admin who created the campaign.

imageUrl.description: URL of the campaign's cover image.

Donation.title: Donation Record
Donation.description: Represents a single donation made by a user or guest.

userId.description: UID of the donating user (nullable for guests).

campaignId.description: ID of the campaign this donation is for.

campaignTitle.description: Title of the campaign at the time of donation.

transactionId.description: Unique ID from the payment gateway.

invoiceId.description: Unique ID for the generated invoice.

donorName.description: Name of the donor (if not anonymous).

donorEmail.description: Email of the donor (if not anonymous).

isCorporateMatch.description: Indicates if the donation is part of a corporate matching program.

corporateName.description: Name of the matching corporation, if applicable.

Invoice.title: Donation Invoice
Invoice.description: Represents a generated invoice for a donation.

invoiceNumber.description: A unique, sequential invoice number (e.g., ONGON-202407-000123).

pdfUrl.description: Link to the generated PDF invoice.

Allocation.title: Fund Allocation
Allocation.description: Represents the allocation of donated funds to a specific usage item.

note.description: Note from the manager making the allocation.

approvedBy.description: UID of the admin who approved it.

UsageItem.title: Donation Usage Item
UsageItem.description: An item or service where donated funds were spent.

Vote.title: Community Vote
Vote.description: Represents a single vote cast by a user for a specific campaign category.

userId.description: The UID of the user who voted.

campaignId.description: The ID of the campaign the vote is for.

category.description: The category the user voted for. This is now a dynamic value.

votedAt.description: Timestamp of when the vote was cast.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public information about a user, including their role and status.

/campaigns/{campaignId}.description: Stores details for each donation campaign.

/donations/{donationId}.description: Stores records of all individual donations.

/campaigns/{campaignId}/usageItems/{usag.description: Stores items on which campaign funds were spent, nested under the campaign.

/usageItems/{usageItemId}.description: Global collection for all usage items for easier querying by admins.

/allocations/{allocationId}.description: Stores the mapping of donations to usage items for transparency.

/votes/{voteId}.description: Stores all votes cast by users for different campaign fund allocations.
